about_the_game:
Eliminate Excessive Vegetation!


What a mess! It looks like no one has taken care of this place for centuries! In this satisfying grubbing simulator, you can relax by cutting, cleaning, mowing, and chopping through overgrown, weed-infested areas—without worrying about back pain!

Cut, clean, burn!


You can achieve your goal in various ways; it's up to you to choose how you want to reach it. Reveal overgrown walls, remove withered plants, uncover forgotten paths, turn impassable thickets into orderly greenery, and much, much more.

Uncover abandoned locations


Forgotten gardens are just the beginning. With the experience you gain and the variety of tools at your disposal, you'll gain access to diverse and unique locations such as skateparks, playgrounds, or military training grounds.

Craft and customize powerful tools


Seemingly useless finds can turn out to be incredibly useful! Discover your inner craftsman, create unique gardening tools that will outshine all commercial gardening equipment with their power and functionality.

Collect valuable treasures


As you make your way through the dense greenery, keep a sharp eye out—you might come across valuable discoveries that will help fund the expansion of your workshop.

name: Overgrown Cleaner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: What a mess! It looks like no one has taken care of this place for centuries! In this satisfying simulator, you can relax by cutting, cleaning, mowing, and chopping through overgrown, weed-infested areas—without worrying about back pain!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
